title: Strange 'copy package' behavior when using 'copy' option
description: When using the 'copy' option in the package viewer, with a package selected in project A, a package named 'ui' appears in the destination project (project X).
OB: After performing the 'copy' operation, project X contains a package named 'ui'.
EB: After performing the 'copy' operation, project X should not create a package named 'ui' that was not present in project A.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project (project X). 
2. In project A, select a package in the package viewer. 
3. Right-click the selected package and choose 'copy' from the context menu. 
4. Paste the copied package into project X.
